title: How did a game that was over at 8 min go for 50min?! | PiG vs Kiwian ZvT Showmatch (Part 1) - SC2
excerpt: Part 2 coming tomorrow! I played a best of 5 against Kiwian (Top) who is a former Terran pro who played in GSL. Neither of us could have predicted that game 1 would go like this... The showmatch went so long I had to split it up for youtube! -- üê∑ Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom
